title: Kai and the Gigantic Firefly
hook: One moonlit night in the great Fora jungle, Kai the mischievous imp encountered a gigantic firefly.
moral: Curiosity can lead to wonderful discoveries and new friendships.
paragraphs: As the moon cast its soft glow over the leafy canopy of the jungle, Kai crept along the shadowy forest floor, his eyes wide with wonder. Suddenly, a flickering light caught his attention. Curiosity piqued, Kai followed the glow through the dense undergrowth.

Peering through the thick foliage, Kai spotted a glowing creature unlike anything he had ever seen before - a gigantic firefly with wings that shimmered like precious gems. Mesmerized by its beauty, Kai edged closer, eager to get a better look.

"Who goes there?" a voice boomed from the darkness, startling Kai. Trembling, he realized he had ventured into the territory of the firefly king. Worried that he had upset the majestic insect, Kai stammered, "I-I mean no harm, Your Majesty. I was just admiring your splendid wings."

The firefly king's stern expression softened as he observed Kai's genuine curiosity. Impressed by Kai's bravery and honesty, the king extended a luminous wing towards the trembling imp. "You have a kind heart, young imp. Stay and marvel at the wonders of our kingdom."

en-fr.title: Kai et la Luciole Gigantesque
en-fr.moral: La curiosité peut amener à de merveilleuses découvertes et de nouvelles amitiés.
en-fr.hook: Une nuit de pleine lune dans la grande jungle de Fora, Kai le farfadet espiègle rencontra une luciole géante.
paragraphs:
Comme la lune jetait sa douce lumière sur la canopée feuillue de la jungle, Kai se faufilait le long du sombre sol forestier, ses yeux grands ouverts d'émerveillement. Soudain, une lumière vacillante attira son attention. La curiosité éveillée, Kai suivit l'éclat à travers le dense sous-bois.
En regardant à travers les feuilles épaisses, Kai a vu une créature brillante comme il n'en avait jamais vu auparavant - une luciole géante avec des ailes qui scintillaient comme des joyaux précieux. Fasciné par sa beauté, Kai s'est approché lentement, impatient de mieux la regarder.
"Qui va là ?" une voix résonnait dans l'obscurité, effrayant Kai. Tremblant, il réalisa qu'il avait pénétré sur le territoire du roi des lucioles. Inquiet d'avoir contrarié l'insecte majestueux, Kai bafouilla, "J-je ne veux pas te nuire, Votre Majesté. Je contemplais juste tes ailes splendides."
Le visage sérieux du roi des lucioles s'adoucit en observant la curiosité sincère de Kai. Impressionné par la bravoure et l'honnêteté de Kai, le roi étendit une aile lumineuse vers le petit lutin tremblant. "Tu as un cœur gentil, jeune lutin. Reste et émerveille-toi des merveilles de notre royaume."

id-en.hook: One moonlit night in the great Fora jungle, Kai the mischievous imp encountered a gigantic firefly.
id-en.moral: Curiosity can lead to wonderful discoveries and new friendships.
id-en.title: Kai and the Gigantic Firefly
paragraphs:
One night, when the moon was shining softly on the jungle trees, Kai walked quietly in the shadowy forest, eyes big with amazement. Then, he saw a twinkling light. Kai wanted to see more, so he followed the light through the thick bushes.
Looking through the dense leaves, Kai saw a shining animal very different from everything he knew - a big lightning bug with wings that sparkled like shiny jewels. Completely captivated by its loveliness, Kai took small steps nearer, very curious to see more.
"Who's there?" a loud voice came from the darkness, scaring Kai. Shaking, he understood he had stepped into the land of the firefly ruler. Afraid that he had made the grand bug sad, Kai said with hesitation, "I-I didn't want to do anything bad, Your Highness. I was simply looking at your beautiful wings."
The shiny bug leader's serious face became happy when he saw Kai's real wonder. The leader was so amazed by Kai's courage and truthfulness that he spread out a bright wing to Kai, who was shaking nervously. "You are a gentle imp, little one. Keep watching and be amazed by the magic of our land."

en-de.title: Kai und die Riesige Glühwürmchen
en-de.hook: An einem klaren Abend im großen Fora Dschungel, traf Kai der neckische Kobold eine riesige Glühwürmchen.
en-de.moral: Neugier kann zu tollen Entdeckungen und neuen Freundschaften führen.
paragraphs:
Als der Mond sein sanftes Glühen über das Laubdach des Dschungels warf, schlich Kai über den schattigen Waldboden, seine Augen weit vor Staunen. Plötzlich fiel ihm ein flackerndes Licht ins Auge. Neugierig geweckt, folgte Kai dem Glühen durch das dichte Unterholz.
Schauend durch das dichte Blattwerk, sah Kai ein leuchtendes Wesen, das ganz anders war als alles, was er je zuvor gesehen hatte - eine riesige Glühwürmchen mit Flügeln, die schimmerten wie kostbare Edelsteine. Von seiner Schönheit verzaubert, näherte sich Kai vorsichtig, um einen besseren Blick zu bekommen.
"Wer geht da?" eine Stimme dröhnte aus der Dunkelheit, und Kai erschrak. Zitternd erkannte er, dass er in das Gebiet des Glühwürmchenkönigs vorgedrungen war. Besorgt, dass er das majestätische Insekt verärgert hatte, stotterte Kai: "I-Ich meine keinen Schaden, Eure Majestät. Ich bewunderte nur Eure prächtigen Flügel."
Der König der Glühwürmchen hatte ein strenges Gesicht, aber es wurde weich, als er Kai's echte Neugierde bemerkte. Beeindruckt von Kais Tapferkeit und Ehrlichkeit, streckte der König einen leuchtenden Flügel zum zitternden kleinen Kobold aus. "Du hast ein gutes Herz, junger Kobold. Bleib hier und bestaune die Wunder unseres Königreichs."

en-pt.title: Kai e a Vagalume Gigante
en-pt.moral: Quando a gente fica curioso, podemos descobrir coisas maravilhosas e fazer novos amigos.
en-pt.hook: Uma noite de lua no grande bosque Fora, o travesso duendecito Kai encontrou uma vaga-lume gigante.
paragraphs:
Quando a lua lançou sua luz suave sobre o dossel de folhas da selva, Kai rastejou pelo chão sombrio da floresta, seus olhos bem abertos de espanto. De repente, uma luz tremeluzente chamou sua atenção. Curiosidade despertada, Kai seguiu o brilho pela vegetação densa.
Olhando através das folhas densas, Kai viu uma criatura brilhante diferente de tudo que ele já tinha visto antes - uma vaga-lume gigante com asas que cintilavam como pedras preciosas. Fascinado pela sua beleza, Kai se aproximou devagar, ansioso para ver melhor.
"Quem está aí?" uma voz retumbou da escuridão, assustando Kai. Tremendo, ele percebeu que tinha entrado no território do rei vaga-lume. Preocupado por ter incomodado o majestoso inseto, Kai gaguejou, "E-eu não quis fazer nenhum mal, Vossa Majestade. Eu só estava admirando suas asas esplêndidas."
O rei vaga-lume, que antes parecia sério, ficou mais simpático ao observar a curiosidade genuína de Kai. Impressionado pela bravura e honestidade de Kai, o rei estendeu uma asa luminosa em direção ao pequeno imp. "Você tem um coração bondoso, jovem imp. Fique e maravilhe-se com as maravilhas do nosso reino."
